role.argrole: thing arg0 does self-study to learn

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 可是)) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VRD (VV 反) (VV 过来)))) (VP (VV 想)))) (PU ，) (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 如果)) (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 张拓芜)) (VP (PP-TMP (P 从) (LCP (NP (NN 年轻)) (LC 时))) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 关心) (IP-Q-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP-WH (AD 如何)) (VP (VV 累积) (NP-OBJ (NN 财富))))))))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 恐怕)) (NP-SBJ (PN 他)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 根本)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 会) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 刻苦)) (VP (VV 自学))) (PU 、) (VP (PP-DIR (P 从) (NP (NN 小兵))) (VP (VV 变) (NP-OBJ (NN 作家))))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 更)) (VP (VPT (VV 写) (AD 不) (VV 出)) (NP-OBJ (NP-TTL-APP (PU 《) (NN 代马) (NN 输卒) (NN 手记) (PU 》)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 这样)) (VP (VA 感人)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 作品)))))))
example.arg: 如果 张拓芜 从 年轻 时 就 关心 *PRO* 如何 累积 财富
